https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500null Battle Skipper is a Japanese direct-to-video animated series based on the small toy mecha action figures by Tomy. Compilation of the 3 episode OVA that focuses mostly on the girls of St Ignacio's School for girls than the mecha itself. Battle Skipper The Movie
